Package org.thewhitemage13.service

Class LikeServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.thewhitemage13.service.LikeServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
LikeServiceInterface
@Service @Transactional public class LikeServiceImpl extends Object implements LikeServiceInterface
Service implementation for managing likes on posts and comments.

This service handles the creation, deletion, and counting of likes for posts and comments. It interacts with the LikeRepository to perform CRUD operations on likes, and uses Kafka to send events related to like actions (created, deleted).

The service leverages caching to improve performance for like-related queries, using the Cacheable and CacheEvict annotations.

Key Features:

  • Supports liking of posts and comments.
  • Enables cache eviction for like-related queries.
  • Uses Kafka for publishing events on like creation and deletion.
  • Handles batch deletion of likes by post, comment, or user.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

  • Method Details

    • deleteAllByCommentId

      @CacheEvict(value="postLikes", key="#commentId") public void deleteAllByCommentId(Long commentId) throws LikeNotFoundException
      Deletes all likes associated with a given comment.

      This method retrieves all likes for the specified comment and deletes each one, triggering cache eviction for the "postLikes" cache.

      Specified by:
      deleteAllByCommentId in interface LikeServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      commentId - the ID of the comment whose likes are to be deleted
      Throws:
      LikeNotFoundException - if no likes are found for the given comment

      Specified by:
      getPostLikeCount in interface LikeServiceInterface
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the total number of likes for the post

    • postLike

      @CacheEvict(value="postLikes", key="#createLikePost.postId", condition="#createLikePost.postId != null") public void postLike(CreateLikePost createLikePost)
      Posts a like for a given post, validating the like and publishing an event.

      This method validates the like request, saves the like entity, and then sends a Kafka event notifying that a like was created. It also triggers cache eviction for the related post's like count.

      Specified by:
      postLike in interface LikeServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      createLikePost - the data required to create a new like for a post

    • commentLike

      @CacheEvict(value="postLikes", key="#createLikeComment.commentId", condition="#createLikeComment.commentId != null") public void commentLike(CreateLikeComment createLikeComment)
      Posts a like for a given comment, validating the like and publishing an event.

      This method validates the like request, saves the like entity, and then sends a Kafka event notifying that a like was created. It also triggers cache eviction for the related comment's like count.

      Specified by:
      commentLike in interface LikeServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      createLikeComment - the data required to create a new like for a comment

    • deleteLike

      @CacheEvict(value="postLikes", key="#likeId") public void deleteLike(Long likeId) throws LikeNotFoundException
      Deletes a like by its ID and sends a Kafka event notifying that the like was deleted.

      This method removes the like entity from the repository and publishes an event to Kafka indicating the like's deletion. It triggers cache eviction for the associated like.

      Specified by:
      deleteLike in interface LikeServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      likeId - the ID of the like to be deleted
      Throws:
      LikeNotFoundException - if no like is found for the given ID
